hero.title: Macondo Bar Latino
hero.subtitle: Authentic Colombian flavor in the heart of Poland
hero.description: Enjoy the best Colombian food, tropical cocktails and a vibrant atmosphere that will transport you directly to Latin America.

lunch.name: Lunch Menu
lunch.description: Enjoy our special lunch menu from 12:00 to 16:00. Includes main dish and drink.

freeDelivery.name: Free Delivery
freeDelivery.description: Free delivery for orders of 5 or more people to the same address. Ideal for offices and companies.

catering.name: Event Catering
catering.description: We organize the perfect catering for your event at our restaurant. Customized menus according to your needs.

bandejaPaisa.name: Bandeja Paisa
bandejaPaisa.description: Rice, beans, pork rind, ground beef, chorizo, egg, avocado and arepa.

ajiaco.name: Ajiaco Santafereño
ajiaco.description: Chicken soup with three types of potatoes, corn, guascas, cream and capers.

sancocho.name: Sancocho de Gallina
sancocho.description: Traditional soup with free-range chicken, yucca, plantain, corn and cilantro.

patacones.name: Patacones with meat
patacones.description: Patacones are the house specialty, can be with meat, vegan or shrimp

mojarra.name: Fried Mojarra
mojarra.description: Whole fried fish served with patacón, coconut rice and salad.

arepas.name: Arepas with meat
arepas.description: The typical and traditional arepas from Colombia grilled make you feel in Colombia tropical climate and unique flavors

aguardiente.name: Aguardiente Antioqueño
aguardiente.description: Traditional Colombian liquor with anise flavor.

mojito.name: Lulo Mojito
mojito.description: Rum, lulo, mint, sugar and soda.

juices.name: Natural Juices
juices.description: Mango, soursop, passion fruit, lulo, blackberry.

vallenatoNight.name: Vallenato Night
vallenatoNight.description: Enjoy the best live vallenato music with the group "Los Diablitos del Vallenato".

salsaSaturday.name: Salsa Saturday
salsaSaturday.description: DJ specialized in classic and modern salsa. Dance floor and special cocktails.

djUro.name: DJ Uro
djUro.description: Celebration with tropical music, special dishes and drink promotions.

footer.description: Macondo Bar Latino - Your Colombian corner in Poland
